sentences.english: The weather this morning is sunny with bright sunshine and a cloudless blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上，天氣晴朗，陽光明媚，碧空萬里烏雲。

sentences.english: With wings, a bird soars in the autumn wind.
sentences.chinese: 只要有翼，當秋風吹起，就能展翅上揚，探索碧空。

sentences.english: Blue sky very quiet, no noise, Jing De inner speech and audible sighs.
sentences.chinese: 碧空極靜，無任何聲響，靜得可聞內心的言語和感嘆。

sentences.english: Blue sky in the clouds like a marshmallow in the sky fly big group.
sentences.chinese: 碧空中的白雲像一大團棉花糖在天空飛翔。

sentences.english: See! The mountains kiss high heaven.
On a day like this, someone walking along the street might have looked up to a blue sky;
sentences.chinese: 天氣晴朗，人們漫步長街，或許會偶爾仰望碧空。

sentences.english: It´s late in November, the blue sky is clear, and Thanksgiving Day is finally here.
sentences.chinese: 十一月末的碧空萬里無雲，感恩節終於要到了。

sentences.english: Azure skies are indicative of good weather .
sentences.chinese: 碧空無雲，預示着一個好天氣。

sentences.english: From a sky of untarnished blue, the sun beamed down upon the city.
sentences.chinese: 陽光透過萬里碧空，照耀着該城。

sentences.english: From the blue sky an eye shall gaze upon me and summon me in silence.
sentences.chinese: 碧空中將有一隻眼睛凝視我，默默地召喚我。

sentences.english: We look up at the blue sky, and enjoy the bigger and brighter moon.
sentences.chinese: 我們仰望碧空，欣賞那一輪明月。

definition: Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
(literary) the vast sky/(finance) eventual downturn/poor prospects in the long term
bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
